title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 703.1 - Purpose and scope
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 703.1 - Purpose and scope

State Regulations
(a) The department shall maintain in its records only such personal information
that is relevant and necessary to fulfill a responsibility of the department
required by statute or executive order, or to implement authorized
programs. (b) Whenever practicable, the department will collect personal information directly from the person to
whom the information pertains. (c) The department seeks to ensure that all records pertaining to or used with
respect to individuals are accurate, relevant, timely and complete. (d) This Part provides information regarding
the procedures by which members of the public may assert rights granted by the

Personal Privacy Protection Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
703.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
